kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Execute
Run Keyword And Return
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and returns from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.name: Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

Run Keyword And Return

${result} = 2021-01-26 06:51:49,216 [main] INFO impl.MetricsConfig: Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2021-01-26 06:51:49,303 [main] INFO impl.MetricsSystemImpl: Scheduled Metric snapshot period a...

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.
